ext_description.message: Displays the number of unread items (e.g. tweets, etc.) with pre-defined search tags.

loading.message: Give it a second. It's going to space!

description_body.message:
Social Media Monitor is a Google Chrome Extension that lets you monitor Social Media (at the moment, only Twitter is 
supported, more services coming soon) by calculating two values for each keyword(s) that you define. The first is the 
current number of Tweets per Minute, while the other is the long-term number of Tweets per Minute. If the current rate 
is more than three times higher than the long-term rate, you'll get an alert.

license_body.message:
